price: 88. Y respondimos a su súplica y lo libramos de su angustia. Así es como salvamos a los creyentes.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَمِّۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُـۨجِي ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: fa-is'tajabnā lahu wanajjaynāhu mina al-ghami wakadhālika nunjī al-mu'minīna
